SERVICE_CLOSED.msg: The WFCatalog service is closed for maintenance

EMPTY_QUERY.msg: The submitted query string is empty

QUERY_LENGTH_EXCEEDED.msg: The maximum query length has been exceeded

POST_LENGTH_EXCEEDED.msg: The maximum POST body length has been exceeded

POST_BODY_EMPTY.msg: The submitted POST body is empty

POST_EMPTY_SEGMENTS.msg: The submitted POST body contains no valid segments

POST_SEGMENTS_EXCEEDED.msg: The submitted POST body exceeds the number of allowed segments

POST_BODY_INVALID.msg: The submitted POST body is invalid

POST_SEGMENT_INVALID.msg: The submitted segment key may not be specified as a key=value pair: %s

INVALID_QUERY.msg: The submitted query string is invalid

DOUBLE_PARAMETER_POST.msg: The submitted POST body contains a double parameter: %s

DOUBLE_PARAMETER_GET.msg: The submitted query string contains a double parameter: %s

INVALID_PARAMETER_GET.msg: The submitted query string contains an unknown key: %s

INVALID_PARAMETER_POST.msg: The submitted POST body contains an unknown key: %s

WRONG_TYPE.msg: The submitted value type is incorrect for key: %s

FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED.msg: The requested output is not supported: %s

GRANULARITY_UNSUPPORTED.msg: The requested granularity is not supported: %s

INCLUDE_UNSUPPORTED.msg: The requested include options is not supported: %s

START_INVALID.msg: The submitted start time is invalid

END_INVALID.msg: The submitted end time is invalid

START_BEYOND_END.msg: The submitted start time is beyond the end time

START_BEYOND_NOW.msg: The submitted start time lies in the future Please come back later

QUALITY_INVALID.msg: The requested data quality (D, R, Q, M, B) is invalid %s

MONGO_CONNECTION_FAILED.msg: The connection to the database could not be established

MAXIMUM_PAYLOAD_EXCEEDED.msg: The requested payload exceeds the service limitation
